      • countOccurrence

        private double[] countOccurrence(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> terms,
                                 java.lang.String document)
        This method check and count the occurrence for the past term
        参数:
        term - the term to check
        documents - the documents collection
        返回:
        array with the occurrence for every document

      • extractTerms

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> extractTerms(java.lang.String[] document)
        This method parse the normalized documents and extract from it all the terms
        参数:
        documents - normalized documents

      • generateMatrix

        public void generateMatrix(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String[]> documents)
        从接口复制的说明: IREngine
        This method generate the Term-Document matrix, for example: Document1: Hi i'm Alessandro Document2: Hi i'm Francesco Matrix: Term |Document1 | Document2 Hi | 1 | 1 i | 1 | 1 m | 1 | 1 Alessandro | 1 | 0 Francesco | 0 | 1
        指定者:
        generateMatrix 在接口中 IREngine
        参数:
        documents - Collection of document, this collection contains two data: - [0] name of document - [0] content of document

      • getSimilarity

        public double getSimilarity(java.lang.String documentName1,
                            java.lang.String documentName2)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: IREngine
        This method return the similarity between two documents
        指定者:
        getSimilarity 在接口中 IREngine
        参数:
        documentName1 - Name of first document
        documentName2 - Name of second document
        返回:
        similarity
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Document not found

      • normalize

        private java.lang.String[] normalize(java.lang.String[] document)
        This method normalize the documents, delete from documents all deny word, or symbol and transform it in lower case.
        参数:
        documents - the collection of documents
        返回:
        the collection of normalized documents
